recipe.name: Egg Flower Soup
recipe.notes: Egg Flour Soup, also known as "Egg Drop Soup"  is one of my favorite Chinese Food treats.  Well worth making.
recipe.preparation: Mix together stock, soy sauce, dry sherry , 3 scallions, ginger, lettuce leaves and sesame oil and bring to a boil and remain for two minutes.Gently pour the eggs into the broth in a thin, steady stream into the center of the pot.  Let sit for three seconds and quickly stir the soup.  Season to taste and allow eggs to cook.  Serve immediately.
recipe.source_name: Ingram, Christine, Roz Denny, and Ketherine Richmond. Vegetarian and Vegetable Cooking. Anness Publishing Ltd: Hermes House, 2002. 145.
